## Plugin interface

The interface that should be returned by a `PluginInitializer`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Plugin<TSetup = void, TStart = void, TPluginsSetup extends object = object, TPluginsStart extends object = object> 
```
